<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// format&#95;hex - Output \\p N as a fixed width hexadecimal. If number will not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fit in width, full number is still printed.  Examples:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 4)              =&gt; 255</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 4, true)        =&gt; 255</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 6)              =&gt; 255</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex(255, 2)              =&gt; 255</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattednumber">FormattedNumber</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c017a4d672e046b7e98f67edf082ec">format&#95;hex</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">Upper</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Width &lt;= 18 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;hex width must be &lt;= 18&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattednumber">FormattedNumber</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, 0, Width, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6893db19648a2dba0912d181aaa57ec0a19de5b94f7b83900d4b296d9fa491aec">Upper</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix - Output \\p N as a fixed width hexadecimal. Does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// prepend &#39;0x&#39; to the outputted string.  If number will not fit in width,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// full number is still printed.  Examples:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 2)              =&gt; ff</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 2, true)        =&gt; FF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 4)              =&gt; 00ff</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   OS &lt;&lt; format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix(255, 1)              =&gt; ff</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c1e29256284cbb6ab1c31bfcdf7770"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/formattednumber">FormattedNumber</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c1e29256284cbb6ab1c31bfcdf7770">format&#95;hex&#95;no&#95;prefix</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width,</span></CodeLine>
